Header: Mahiyangana Rajamaha temple have been robbed of 8 lakhs
Content: Police Media spokesperson office reports that a person had entered through the window of the Mahiyangana Rajamaha temples room yesterday afternoon and had robbed Rs. 8 lakhs sixty thousand. It further states that along with the money a video camera and a valuable watch also have been stolen. The police have not arrested anyone in this connection so far.
